item.description: Resume I am a student in Big Data. I have a bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering & Computer Science. I love programming and doing some data stuff. Currently looking for an apprenticeship in Data Science. Work Experience Software Developer Intern CERGI SA, Lomé-Togo - (June 2018 ~ Oct. 2018) Mobile-Money management platform. Built with ASP.NET MVC and SQL Server Software Developer Intern DCN TECHNOLOGIES, Lomé-Togo - (June 2019 ~ Sep. 2019) School management platform.
